name: 👹 Ad Nauseam ⚔️
description:
Paint your army  and get them battle ready to fend of the hoards of hell in this table-top themed RTS!

Includes over 10 unique characters, skill-shots and demons. 

Explore a massive forested map to find ruins of rare and valuable DemonTythe. Call upon the help of mighty heroes from across the land.

Build your own base, flying the colours of your nation proudly to keep your sanctum safe. How many days will you last? 

Fight terrifying and complex pentagram demon bosses such as -

Made in 6 weeks and submitted to the JamFuser employment pathway. 

Code & Design - Benedict Targett - @SyriphDev Art & Design - Ellis Carter - @EllisCarter3D Code - Amelia Grant - @MillyWasTaken
